#define def_pack_int_operators ( T   ) 

Value:

uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator << (T a) { \
  m_rep->pack_int_n(a,8*sizeof(T));\
  return *this;\
} \
uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (T& a) {  \
  a = (T)(m_rep->unpack_int_n(8*sizeof(T))); \
  return *this; \
}

  m_rep->pack_##T(a);\
  return *this;\
} \
uvm_packer& uvm_packer::operator >> (T& a) {  \
  m_rep->unpack_##T(a); \
  return *this; \
}
